text: Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Fuhuo de shijian jiang bu hui jianglin women.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Bu! Yi wo de zhu fashi! Ta kending hui jianglin nimen.[Wo de zhu] shi quan zhi wei jian zhi wu de, tiandi jian meiyou yige yuanzi zhi zhong de dongxi neng manguo ta [zhu], wulun shi bi zhe geng xiao de, haishi bi zhe geng da de, dou yi jilu zai yi bu mingbai de tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong.”
